files.patch: @@ -2149,3 +2149,4 @@ - * This is overridden to return false if the current Icon's - * Image is not equal to the - * passed in Image img. + * If the button icon for the current button state is either null + * or not an ImageIcon with an Image equal to the + * passed in Image, return false; otherwise it + * will delegate to the super-class.

@@ -877,2 +877,4 @@ - * This is overridden to return false if the current Icon's Image is - * not equal to the passed in Image img. + * If the component is not showing or either the icon or disabled + * icon is not an ImageIcon with an Image + * equal to the passed in Image, return false; + * otherwise it will delegate to the super-class.
